title: PA-18-04: Revisions to the Public and Confidential Financial Disclosure Forms
url: https://www.oge.gov/Web/oge.nsf/Legal Docs/422671DD20BEB238852585BA005BEC28/$FILE/PA on Release of Revised FD Forms FINAL.pdf?open
summary: This Program Advisory highlights changes to the public and confidential financial disclosure forms necessitated by the recent revision of 5 C.F.R. part 2634. The revised forms go into effect January 1, 2019.
